children.name: Get an overview of your Procure-to-Pay Process

blocks.text: This Dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Procure-to-Pay process. It highlights some key KPIs as well as a high-level analysis of the process to identify areas to investigate further.
Page 1: Discovery - A process model from your event log data, displays the most common process paths.
Page 3: Analysis- High-level analysis of key use cases
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.
For a more detailed analysis of key process areas, see other available dashboards.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID")
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Id")
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: On-Time Delivery Rate
children.description: Definition: count of PO Items with "Delivery Completed" Flag and where the last "GR Creation Date" happened before the "Requested Delivers Date"

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	(1 - COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") 
        	> "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date" 
            AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes') 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes')) 
        * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT
	COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id" )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Definition: the time between 'Create PR Item' and 'Clear Invoice' is measured

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PR Item'))))      
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PR Item' ~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Definition: Payments are considered late, when the invoice clearing happens after the invoice due date.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" 
        	< "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date")) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)) 
    * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of overdue invoices
children.description: Definition: An Invoice is considered as overdue if it is not cleared yet and the due date is in the past

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL) 
        	AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Definition: Percentage of cases with events like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%' OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'))) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 10 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of PTP events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
    	('Create PO Item'|'Create PR Item')
		~> 'Release PO'
		~> 'Create Goods Receipt'
		~> ('Record Invoice Receipt'|'Create FI Invoice')
		~> 'Clear Invoice'
        )) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice')) 
    * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Maverick Buying Rate
children.description: Definition: Whenever the PO Item is created after the Invoice is created, it is considered "Maverick Buying"

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create FI Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total PO Net Order Value
children.description: Definition: sum of "PO Item Net Order Value in USD" (ekpo.netwr_converted)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM("PO Item Net Order Value in USD")
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Automation Rate
children.description: Definition of Automation Rate: Ratio of Events performed using SAP users of type 'System' or 'Service'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service'))))) 
	/ SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME))) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Average Cycle Time
children.description: Definition: the time between 'Create PR Item' and 'Clear Invoice' is measured

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PR Item'))))
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Create PR Item' ~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Definition: Payments are considered late, when the invoice clearing happens after the invoice due date.

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" 
        	< "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date")) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)) 
        * 100        
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with events like 'Update Price' or 'Change Payment Terms'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%' OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'))) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Level
children.description: Percentage of cases which follow the pre-defined order of events

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
    	('Create PO Item'|'Create PR Item')
		~> 'Release PO'
		~> 'Create Goods Receipt'
		~> ('Record Invoice Receipt'|'Create FI Invoice')
		~> 'Clear Invoice')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice')) 
    * 100 AS "Conformance Rate"

FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date", 

	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" 
        	< "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date")) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)) 
        * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate"      
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date", 

	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
    	('Create PO Item'|'Create PR Item')
		~> 'Release PO'
		~> 'Create Goods Receipt'
		~> ('Record Invoice Receipt'|'Create FI Invoice')
		~> 'Clear Invoice')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID)
    * 100 AS "Conformance Rate"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date",
    
    SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service'))))) 
	/ SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME))) * 100 AS "Automation rate"
                
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL

SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date",
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Update%' OR EVENT_NAME ILIKE '%Change%'))) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Change Rate"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Late Delivery Rate
children.description: Definition: count of PO Items with "Delivery Completed" Flag and where the last "GR Creation Date" happened after the "Requested Delivers Date"

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") 
        	> "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date" 
            AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes') 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes')
        * 100        
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Automation Rate
children.description: Definition of Automation Rate: Ratio of Events performed using SAP users of type 'System' or 'Service'

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
    	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service'))))) 
	/ SUM ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME))) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Vendor by Volume and Late Delivery Rate (Top 10)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "No. of PO Items",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
  	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") 
		> "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date" 
        AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes') 
    / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes') 
  		* 100 AS "Late Delivery Rate", 
	"PO Vendor Name"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "PO Vendor Name" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PO Item')))) AS "PO Creation Date",
    
    AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Clear Invoice')))
   	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
    	WHERE event_name IN ('Create PR Item')))) AS "Average cycle time"
    
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create PR Item' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'), NULL
